name: Dungeon Dude:Temple of the Awkward Eye
name_original: Dungeon Dude:Temple of the Awkward Eye
description:
Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022 Submission. 

Use arrow keys to move, Z to open the Map, and X to open the status screen. 

R resets the game.

I had to finish this on the road, so sadly the scope was signficantly reduced.
